name: Alien Bonus
description:
This Game was made in much much less then 48 hours for GameDev Undergrounds JimJam 2018 but its something!

The theme of the Jam was insipiration, I chose for my inspiration a GDC talk by Jake Birkett which i often watch when i need to feel inspired. The talk is called How to Survive in Gamedev for Eleven Years Without a Hit and is available to watch on youtube

Now the game itself doesnt have much to do with the talk, but Jake Birkett's company is called grey alien games and he has made alot match three games. I figured i could do something different with that theme and genre

Maybe someday ill use my twitter @LakeshoreGames
